titleStmt.title: Nevves of the complement of the art of nauigation And of the mightie empire of Cataia. Together with the Straits of Anian. By A.L. The principall contents whereof follow in the next page.
titleStmt.author: Linton, Anthony.

notesStmt.note: The author's name, Anthony Linton, appears on A2 recto.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
